questions.correctAnswer: Retrofit is a type-safe HTTP client for Android and Java that makes it easy to consume REST APIs by converting HTTP APIs into Java interfaces.
questions.explanation: Retrofit handles network requests/responses, URL handling, and conversion.

questions.questionText: What are the main components of Retrofit?
questions.correctAnswer: Retrofit instance, API interface, Converters, Call adapters.
questions.explanation: API interface defines endpoints, converters handle serialization, call adapters manage async.
